title: Sub-national estimates of non-gas, non-electricity, and non-road transport fuel consumption in 2021
summary: Contains sub-national percentage estimates of non-gas, non-electricity, and non-road transport fuel consumption in 2021 (in thousand tonnes of oil equivalent (ktoe)) [Note 1]
description: The entire time series is revised each year to take account of methodological improvements.
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-energy-security-and-net-zero

area_label.label: Local Authority
area_label.description: The local authorities shown in these tables are based on local authority boundaries as at 1 April 2022.
